casebody.data:
Autumn LEWIS and Stephen Lewis, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF the FLAVIUS J. WITHAM MEMORIAL HOSPITAL d/b/a Willowbend Living Center, Appellee-Defendant. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A04-1704-CT-702 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED November 8, 2017

RILEY , J.

Affirmed.

ROBB, J., Concurs.

PYLE, J., Concurs.
